title: Mastery Token

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Hello

I got an S Rank in a game but did not receive a Mastery Token, is there something else I need to do to report?

Thanks

replies.body:
Hello

The same thing has happened to me twice on Annie now, as stated above I got an S.
What game mode were you playing? You can only earn a mastery token while playing on normal and ranked SR matches. You will not be able to earn them on ARAM, TT, or any of the rotating game modes.

In order to receive Champion Mastery 7 tokens, you must earn a grade S or S+. S- grades are not eligible for a token. For more info, check out our [Champion Mastery Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)

Let me know if you have any questions.
